name: portainer-compose
description: My docker compose files for my home server
author: Paul DiLoreto <paul.diloreto@gmail.com>

scripts.update-network: yarn network down && yarn network pull && yarn network up -d
scripts.update-media: yarn media down && yarn media pull && yarn media up -d
scripts.update-backup: yarn backup down && yarn backup pull && yarn backup up -d
scripts.update-hass: yarn hass down && yarn hass pull && yarn hass up -d
scripts.update-all: yarn update-network && yarn update-media && yarn update-hass && yarn update-backup
scripts.restart-all: yarn network up -d && yarn media up -d && yarn backup up -d && yarn hass up -d
